properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_CLSFC , NOTICE_NAME , NOTICE_DATE FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE( NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_NAME , NOTICE_CONTENTS , NOTICE_DATE , NOTICE_CLSFC , NOTICE_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , DEFAULT )
